sectionHeading: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 8 at 4:00 p.m.

incidentType: Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75S at Clays Ferry Bridge:
location: 7 p.m. to midnight on Tuesday August 8.

incidentType: Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75S at Clays Ferry Bridge:
location: The left and center lanes will be blocked for bridge repair work.
On Wednesday 8/9, the ferry will close for the day at 8:30 a.m. for maintenance.
The ferry will reopen on a regular schedule on Thursday 8/10.
